14 class Token : public String {
15 public:
16  Token();
17  Token(char * mem, size_t s, const char * src, const char * delim, const char * ignore = 0);
18  Token(const char * src, const char * delim, const char * ignore = 0);
19  Token(const String & src, const char * delim, const char * ignore = 0);
20 
21  void parse(const char * delim, const char * ignore = 0);
22 
23 
25  inline size_t count() const { return num_tokens; }
26  inline size_t size() const { return count(); }
27 
29  const char * at(size_t n) const;
30 
31  static bool belongs_to(const char c, const char * str, unsigned int len);
32  static bool belongs_to(const char c, const char * str){
33  return belongs_to(c, str, strlen(str));
34  }
35

46 template <unsigned int arraysize>
47 class TokenStatic : public Token {
48 public:
49  TokenStatic(const char * str, const char * delim, const char * ignore = 0) : Token(s,arraysize+1,str,delim,ignore){}
50  TokenStatic(const String & str, const char * delim, const char * ignore = 0) : Token(s,arraysize+1,str,delim,ignore){}
51 
52 private:
53  char s[arraysize+1];
54 };
55 
57 class TokenTiny : public TokenStatic<16> {
58 public:
59  TokenTiny(const char * s, const char * delim, const char * ignore = 0) : TokenStatic(s,delim,ignore){}
60  TokenTiny(const String & s, const char * delim, const char * ignore = 0) : TokenStatic(s,delim,ignore){}
61 };
62

66  TokenSmall(const char * s, const char * delim, const char * ignore = 0) : TokenStatic(s,delim,ignore){}
67  TokenSmall(const String & s, const char * delim, const char * ignore = 0) : TokenStatic(s,delim,ignore){}
68 };
